The reading assignment to look at this week is: [What is Data?](http://paldhous.github.io/ucb/2016/dataviz/week1.html): http://paldhous.github.io/ucb/2016/dataviz/week1.html

Read and understand the following sections:

1. Types of data: categorical vs. continuous
1. What shape is your data?
1. Working with categorical data
1. Working with continuous data: consider the distribution
1. Beyond the “average”: mean, median, and mode
